We Take Challenges To The Next Level – more to come

[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”

Be part of our Test Challenges and prove your Ethical Hacking skills, live on our environments. Test your “muscles“, capture all the challenges and win the prize. Prize? Each Test Challenge has a specific prize!

For the First Test Challenge of this year – 2020, we had two flags that needed to be captured. It was pretty difficult to capture them at first sight but first blood came and from that point, it was a matter of time until they captured the second flag.
